text: Liyi Dai is an electrical engineer from the United States Army Research Office in Durham, North Carolina. Dai was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to discrete event systems and singular systems. ==References== Category:20th- century births Category:Living people Category:Chinese electrical engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Liyi Dai
